name: donor
description: The collection of data elements related to a specific donor in an ARGO program.

fields.name: program_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.
Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
fields.name: submitter_donor_id

fields.description: Donor's last known state of living or deceased.
fields.name: vital_status

fields.description: Indicate the cause of a donor's death.
fields.name: cause_of_death

meta.notes: Cause of death is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is Deceased.

fields.description: Interval of how long the donor has survived since primary diagnosis, in days.
fields.name: survival_time

meta.notes: Survival_time is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is Deceased.

fields.name: primary_site
fields.description: The text term used to describe the primary site of disease, as categorized by the World Health Organization's (WHO) International Classification of Diseases for Oncology (ICD-O). This categorization groups cases into general categories.

meta.notes: To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

fields.description: Indicate the donor's height, in centimeters (cm).
fields.name: height

fields.description: Indicate the donor's weight, in kilograms (kg).
fields.name: weight

fields.description: Indicate the donor's Body Mass Index (BMI) in kg/mÂ².
fields.name: bmi

fields.description: Indicate presence of any hereditary genetic disorders. Genetic diseases are diseases in which inherited genes predispose to increased risk. The genetic disorders associated with cancer often result from an alteration or mutation in a single gene. The diseases range from rare dominant cancer family syndrome to familial tendencies in which low-penetrance genes may interact with other genes or environmental factors to induce cancer. (References: NCIt C3101. Genetic disorder names were standardized using Orphanet (https://www.orpha.net/) and NCI Thesaurus)
fields.name: genetic_disorders

meta.notes: If the genetic disorder term you use is not included in the controlled terminology, please contact us at https://platform.icgc-argo.org/contact to request it be added. To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

fields.description: Indicate the donor's menopause status at the time of primary diagnosis. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2434914)
fields.name: menopause_status

fields.description: Indicate the donor's age, in years, at which the first menstruation event occurred. (Reference: NCIt C19666)
fields.name: age_at_menarche

fields.description: Indicate the total number of pregnancy events experienced by the donor. (Reference: NCIt C106551)
fields.name: number_of_pregnancies

fields.description: Indicate the number of children the donor has birthed. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2486644)
fields.name: number_of_children

fields.description: Indicate the type of hormone replacement therapy (HRT) the donor has taken or is currently taking.
fields.name: hrt_type

fields.description: If donor has taken hormone replacement therapy (HRT), indicate how long donor has been taking HRT, in months. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 5365433)
fields.name: hrt_duration

fields.description: Indicate the type of hormonal contraception the donor has taken or is currently taking. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 3264234)
fields.name: contraception_type

fields.description: If donor has taken hormonal contraception, indicate duration of use, in months. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 5206887)
fields.name: contraception_duration
